name: Naruto's Quest
description:
Naruto's Quest is a free to play game made for the Oculus Quest. Plans to keep improving and developing the game more and more are in motion and Traindz would appreciate any support that can be given to help build upon this project. Immerse in battle with Pain and white Zetsu to save the hidden leaf village from being destroyed. Use Rasengan, your Kunai, or use your fists to defend yourself against the challenge that you face. Become Konoha's savior.

The game is completely free but your donations will help build upon the game and help add more features.

Visist www.traindz.com to find more games.
